com.konakart.blif

Interface ContentMgrIf

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ContentMgr, ContentMgrEE

    public interface ContentMgrIf
    ContentMgrIf

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ContentIf getContent(int contentId, int languageId)
      Get the latest (last to be inserted) enabled Content record with the specified contentId for the specified languageId.

    • Method Detail

      • getContent

        ContentIf getContent(int contentId,
                   int languageId)
                     throws com.konakart.app.KKException
        Get the latest (last to be inserted) enabled Content record with the specified contentId for the specified languageId. Content Dates are not checked.
        Parameters:
        contentId -
        languageId - the languageId of the Content to return (Content Descriptions are language-specific). If KKConstants.DEFAULT_LANGUAGE_ID is used the default languageId is used).
        Returns:
        a ContentIf object or a null if no matching content could be found.
        Throws:
        com.konakart.app.KKException

      • getContents

        ContentSearchResultIf getContents(java.lang.String sessionId,
                                ContentSearchIf search,
                                DataDescriptorIf dd)
                                  throws com.konakart.app.KKException
        Retrieve Content records using the specified search criteria
        Parameters:
        sessionId - the sessionId of the customer. This may be used to look up the customer in order to evaluate expressions to determine the required content. Set to null if the customer isn't logged in.
        search - the content search criteria
        dd - the data descriptor object
        Returns:
        search results in a ContentSearchResultIf object
        Throws:
        com.konakart.app.KKException

      • getContentType

        ContentTypeIf getContentType(int contentTypeId,
                           int languageId)
                             throws com.konakart.app.KKException
        Return the ContentType for the specified language and contentTypeId
        Parameters:
        contentTypeId - the ContentTypeId
        languageId - the languageId of the ContentType to return (Content Type Descriptions are language-specific). If KKConstants.DEFAULT_LANGUAGE_ID is used the default language is used)
        Returns:
        a ContentTypeIf object
        Throws:
        com.konakart.app.KKException

      • getContentTypes

        ContentTypeIf[] getContentTypes(int languageId)
                                throws com.konakart.app.KKException
        Return all the ContentTypes for the specified language
        Parameters:
        languageId - the languageId of the ContentTypes to return (Content Type Descriptions are language-specific). If KKConstants.DEFAULT_LANGUAGE_ID is used the default language is used)
        Returns:
        an array of ContentTypeIf objects; An empty array may be returned but never a null.
        Throws:
        com.konakart.app.KKException

      • refreshConfigs

        void refreshConfigs()
                    throws java.lang.Exception
        Refresh the configuration of the ContentMgr
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
